name: Collection Manager
description:
Hi Guys (•̀ᴗ•́) و ̑̑

This is one simple Collection Manager games by using unity. 

There are more than 24 cards in this demo. You can turn the page to view all of cards. Also, You can press the button to filter the cards in different conditions.

Controls
  • Turn Page: AD
Features
  • Search by card's MANA or CLASS
Graphics & Audio & Resources
  • (•̀ᴗ•́) و ̑̑ The resources (Holy Knight Assets can be downloaded from Team Cherry Official Website) or you can download from my Github.
